physicalDescription.skinColor: iridescent teal with a faint bioluminescent glow
physicalDescription.eyeColor: liquid silver with fractal patterns in the iris
physicalDescription.bodyStructure: elongated limbs with three jointed fingers and toes, slender and semi-transparent torso revealing faintly glowing organs
physicalDescription.hair: none, but a series of flexible, antenna-like tendrils on the head that can move independently and emit faint pulses of light
physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: a series of intricate, naturally occurring geometric patterns etched into their skin that shift slowly over time

biology.diet: absorbs energy from starlight through photosynthetic cells in their skin
biology.reproductiveMethod: asexual budding every 100 years, producing a single offspring
biology.uniqueAbilities: telepathic communication through light pulses, enhanced night vision, ability to temporarily phase through solid matter by molecular vibration

technology.primaryDevice: Plasmatron Sphere, a hovering device that can generate shields, project holograms, and emit focused energy beams
technology.wearableTech: Ephemeral Bracelets, which allow limited manipulation of gravity for levitation and precise movement in low-gravity environments
technology.transportation: Stellar Veil, a personal spacecraft that folds space for near-instantaneous travel between points in the galaxy
technology.everydayItems: Memory Prism, a crystalline tool that stores memories and can replay them as vivid, interactive holograms

notableEvents: Discovered a dying star harboring a sentient energy lifeform and forged a symbiotic relationship with it.
Negotiated peace between two warring galactic factions using their telepathic abilities and holographic projections of shared history.
Survived a near-fatal encounter with a collapsing black hole, which unlocked their ability to phase through matter.
Accidentally triggered an ancient alien artifact, resulting in a temporary rift in space-time and the loss of their original homeworld.
goals: To rebuild their lost homeworld by gathering remnants of their species scattered across the galaxy.
To uncover the true origin of the ancient artifact that caused the rift in space-time.
To foster peace and unity among divided civilizations in the galaxy.
To learn the secrets of the sentient energy lifeform bonded with them and understand its purpose.
challenges: Constantly hunted by a mysterious group known as the Riftkeepers, who blame them for the destabilization of space-time.
Struggling with the emotional burden of being one of the last of their kind.
Their symbiosis with the energy lifeform occasionally causes uncontrollable surges of power, putting themselves and others at risk.
The shifting patterns on their skin are a sign of an unknown condition that may eventually cause their molecular structure to destabilize.
